channel.title: How to make it so you can only get something once?
channel.description:
hey everyone, i just finished up my christmas event but i need to add some sort of one time use. i have a chest that you open and recieve some items for a present, how can i make it so the player can only recieve the gift once? [508 codeusea base - pulsepk source]
and example code would be great, any help is appreciated
thanks

item.title: How to make it so you can only get something once?
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

ok, well then, sorry. i didnt think that was a question. can you please help me?

EDIT* please anyone help me?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make it so you can only get something once?
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

If they can lose the item and not receive it again, then i cant help. If they lose the item, and can get another one, I could probally help. So stfu I was going to help you. All you had to do was answer my question. So dont be a pain in my ass.

Read full topic
